options.content:
![svg image](data:image/svg+xml;base64,)


# Kubernetes Sustainability Dashboard

This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic application resource manager on Energy consumption and Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your Kubernetes environments.

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*24*365/1000 as "kWh/year"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' 
AND ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Energy Consumption

panels.description: List of all applications in the selected scope sorted by the ones with the most carbon emissions over the selected period at the top. Carbon emissions associated with application groups are of the VMs that are part of each application group.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e.name as "Container Name",
  s.scoped_oid as "OID"
FROM scope s
join entity e on e.oid = s.seed_oid


where
e.type = 'CONTAINER_POD' 
AND e.name not like '%instana%'
AND e.name not like '%openshift%'
AND e.name not like '%instana%'
AND e.name not like '%instana%'

SELECT
  m.entity_oid as "OID",
  sum(m.current)*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}/1000 as "CO2e (t)"
FROM metric m
where 
  $__timeFilter(m.time) AND
  m.entity_type = 'CONTAINER_POD' AND
  m.type = 'VCPU' AND
  m.current>0
GROUP BY "OID"
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Top Applications by CO2e emissions

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' 
AND ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})

panels.title: Request Resize Actions Impact on CO2

options.content: # Sustainability Impact This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic Actions on Carbon Dioxide equivalents (CO2e) emissions in your K8s environment.

panels.description: This shows the latest data point for the total number of VMs in the selected scope.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  m."time" as "time",
  count(m.current)
FROM metric m
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(m."time") AND
  m.entity_type = 'CONTAINER_POD' AND
  m.type = 'VCPU'
GROUP BY m.time
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Total Number of Pods

panels.description: Current number of pending VM Resize actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' AND
ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})
AND a.description like '%VCPU Request%'

panels.title: Resize Actions

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' AND
ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Cores

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on Energy Consumption

panels.description: Net impact on vCPU resources from pending VM Resize Actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "Difference"
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid

panels.title: Resize Actions Impact on CO2e

panels.description: Current number of pending VM Resize actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e.name as "Name",
  ns.name as "Namespace",
  a.severity as "Severity",
  a.description as "Description",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "VCPU Limits",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "MEMORY Limits",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "VCPU Requests",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "MEMORY Requests",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "CO2 Difference"

FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' AND
ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})
AND a.description like '%VCPU Request%'

panels.title: Current Resize Actions

options.content: # Global Impact This dashboard shows the impact of IBM Turbonomic Actions on overall resource utilisation in your K8s environment.

panels.description: Current number of pending VM Resize actions.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(*)
FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' AND
ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  e.name as "Name",
  ns.name as "Namespace",
  a.severity as "Severity",
  a.description as "Description",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "VCPU Limits",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "MEMORY Limits",
  ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "VCPU Requests",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VMEM_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000 as "MEMORY Requests",
   ((a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'to')::float - (a.attrs->'resizeInfo'->'VCPU_REQUEST'->>'from')::float)/1000*${CPU_CONSUMPTION}/${CORES_CPU}*${W_WH_RATIO}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE}*${PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR}*24*365/1000 as "CO2 Difference"

FROM pending_action a
join entity e on e.oid = a.target_entity_id
join scope s on e.oid = s.seed_oid
join entity ns on ns.oid = s.scoped_oid

where
e.type = 'WORKLOAD_CONTROLLER' AND
ns.type = 'NAMESPACE' AND
ns.name in (${NAMESPACE})

panels.title: Current Resize Actions

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM entity WHERE (type = 'NAMESPACE' AND name NOT LIKE '%kube-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%openshift-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%open-cluster%' ) LIMIT 50
list.label: Namespace
list.name: NAMESPACE
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM entity WHERE (type = 'NAMESPACE' AND name NOT LIKE '%kube-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%openshift-%' AND name NOT LIKE '%open-cluster%' ) LIMIT 50

list.description: Maximum consumption of your Private Cloud hosts in Watts. You can refer the the "All Published SPECpower_ssh2008 Results" link to get the values for your specific host.
list.label: PUE
list.name: PRIVATE_CLOUD_AVG_PUE

list.description: Private Cloud Emissions Factor corresponds to 1,562.4 lbs CO2/MWh × (4.536 × 10^(-4) metric tons/lb) × 0.001 MWh/kWh = 7.09 × 10^(-4) metric tons CO2/kWh
list.label: Emissions Factor
list.name: PRIVATE_CLOUD_EMISSIONS_FACTOR
